document_data.name: Surface Sojourn
document_data.mainbody: '''''Surface sojourn''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Deep Sashelas]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed such creatures as [[aquatic elf|aquatic elves]], [[Half-sea elf|aquatic half-elves]], [[malenti]], [[merfolk]] and [[sahuagin]] to exist on land without experiencing the normal physical discomfort and stresses. The spell acted by enveloping the targeted creatures skin with a thin layer of water
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Deep Sashelas and the shell from a snail.
